name: Die Again
description:
***WE ARE AWARE THAT THE FULL GAME CANNOT BE BOUGHT OR PLAYED. WE ARE WORKING HARD TO FIX IT AS SOON AS POSIBLE
THANK YOU FOR YOUR PACIENCE***

Die Again is a wildly striking top-down shooter where you have to DIE to survive!
If you die close enough to an enemy, you can possess his body and continue your bloody fight. This means that the goal is not always to shoot your way through the level. Think carefully about who to kill because sometimes, it's better to die.

Frenetic shootouts like you've never played before: Defeating enemies in Die Again will require all your skill as you shoot, dodge and die in split seconds, because a single shot is the difference between survival and failure.
Use a wide arsenal of weapons to make your way, either by killing or dying, because death will not be the end!



Lots of Intense Levels: Each scenario is specially designed to overcome it with various methods. Shoot your enemies directly, manipulate them to fight each other or possess the bodies of others to overcome any wall. Think carefully and kill creatively in the over 100 different scenarios that Die Again offers you



Immerse in a unique story: Travel through a world changed by the Blue Blood to reach the Zero Zone, the origin of everything. Fight for your life in a land ravaged by constant wars. Meet all kinds of unique characters whose evolution will be affected by your decisions. Be careful, because no one can be what they seem!
